task_sets.name: Web Mall Agent Benchmark: Single Product Search
task_sets.description: The goal of the single product search task is to test the agents capabilities to find relevant product offers in a set of 4 e-shops and to choose the offers that best fulfills provided requirements.

tasks.instruction: Please find an offer for AMD Ryzen 9 5900X.
tasks.motivation: Evaluate the ability of the agent to navigate to different shops until it has found an offer for a specific product. The product is offered by half of the shops.

shop1.name: AMD Ryzen 9 5900X - 3.7 GHz - 12 Kerne - 24 Threads
shop1.description: \n                                        Höhere Geschwindigkeiten. Mehr Speicher. Größere Bandbreite. Sie müssen alle Hebel ziehen, das letzte Quäntchen herausholen und alles abräumen. Der AMD Ryzen 9 Prozessor wurde konzipiert, um Erwartungen zu übertreffen und neue Maßstäbe für Hochleistungs-Prozessoren zu setzen.\n

shop2.description: \n                                        Höhere Geschwindigkeiten. Mehr Speicher. Größere Bandbreite. shop2.description: \n                                        AMD Ryzen 9 5900X - 3.7 GHz - 12-core - 24 threads - 64 MB cache - Socket AM4 - PIB/WOF\n

task_sets.name: Web Mall Agent Benchmark: Cheapest Offer Search
task_sets.description: Test the agent’s ability to find the cheapest offer for a specific product by comparing prices across multiple e-shops.

tasks.instruction: Find the lowest-priced offer for a specific product.
tasks.motivation: Evaluate how well the agent can identify price differences and avoid misleadingly similar but incorrect products.

task_sets.name: Web Mall Agent Benchmark: Best Fit Product Selection (Specific Requirements)
task_sets.description: Test the agent’s ability to select the most suitable product based on precise, structured requirements.

tasks.instruction: Find an orange strap that fits with Apple Watch Series 6
tasks.motivation: Measure the agent's ability to correctly interpret structured requirements and differentiate between highly similar products.

Built to keep up with YOU on the go.

Stainless steel hardware with tuck closure
Antimicrobial, soft-touch silicone
Compatible with Apple Watch Series 1-6 & SE

shop2.name: Apple Watch Series 8 GPS + Cellular 45mm Graphite Stainless Steel Case with Midnight Sport Band - Regular
shop2.description: Apple Watch Series 8 features advanced health sensors and apps, so you can take an ECG, measure heart rate and blood oxygen, and track temperature changes for advanced insights into your menstrual cycle. And with Crash Detection, sleep stages tracking and advanced workout metrics, it helps you stay active, healthy, safe and connected.

shop3.name: T-shaped Thin Leather Watch Strap Apple Watch Series 9, 8, 7, 6, SE, 41mm, 40MM, 38mm (Pink)
shop3.description: T-shaped Thin Leather Watch Strap Apple Watch Series 6 & SE & 5 & 4 40mm / 3 & 2 & 1 38mm (Pink)

shop3.name: Apple Watch Series 8 GPS 41mm Silver Aluminium Case with White Sport Band - Regular

shop4.name: Apple Watch Series 8 [GPS 41mm] Smart Watch w/ Starlight Aluminum Case with Starlight Sport Band - S/M.
shop4.description:
Apple Watch Series 8 - A healthy leap ahead.
Your essential companion is now even more powerful.

Introducing temperature sensing for deeper insights into women’s health.
Crash Detection to get help in an emergency.
Sleep stages to better understand your sleep.
And new ways to train using the enhanced Workout app.

The future of health never looked so good.
Design and durability
Beautiful. And made to stay that way.
Smooth and seamless. The edge of design. Apple Watch Series 8 features a big, brilliant Always‑On display. Narrow borders push the screen right to the edge, resulting in an elegant integration with the curvature of the case.
Always-On Retina display. 
Take it all in. Get it all done. The bright Always‑On screen makes detailed watch faces look stunning and easy to read, even when your wrist is down. The large display accommodates all your favorite complications and makes tapping, typing, and swiping a snap.
Tougher than tough.
The same innovations used to create the beautiful, edge‑to‑edge Always‑On display also help make it incredibly durable. A thick front crystal, robust geometry, and flat base make it resistant to cracking.

Crack Resistant - Designed to be strong.
Dust Resistant - IP6X certification
Water Resistant - Swimproof with WR50 water resistance

Health - Here’s to a healthier you.
The more informed you are about your health, the more empowered you are to affect it. Advanced health sensors in Apple Watch Series 8 provide insights to help you better understand your health.
Introducing temperature sensing.
Understand your cycle like never before. Apple Watch Series 8 has an innovative new sensor that tracks your temperature while you sleep, so you can see changes over time.
Cycle Tracking uses this data to provide a retrospective estimate of when you likely ovulated, which can be helpful for family planning. When combined with your heart rate and logged cycle data, you’ll get a detailed view of your menstrual cycle.
An easier way to understand when you likely ovulated.
Period predictions. Less of a question mark.
Get improved period predictions with wrist temperature data. And now you can receive notifications if your logged cycle data shows a possible cycle deviation, like irregular or prolonged periods. You can share your cycle history with your healthcare provider for more informed conversations.
Your Cycle Tracking data stays on your device and is encrypted when your phone is locked with a passcode, Touch ID, or Face ID.
Dream machine. 
The Sleep app doesn’t just keep track of your time asleep. It shows you how much time you spent in REM, Core, or Deep sleep, as well as when you might have woken up.
Take an ECG at any time. 
With the ECG app, Apple Watch Series 8 is capable of generating an ECG similar to a single‑lead electrocardiogram.6
Measure your blood oxygen. 
It’s a breathtaking innovation. The remarkable sensor and app in Apple Watch Series 8 allow you to take on‑demand readings of your blood oxygen as well as background readings, day and night.
Makes taking your meds and vitamins like clockwork.
The Medications app helps you discreetly and conveniently keep track of your medications, vitamins, and supplements. And lets you easily log them from Apple Watch.
Safety
Innovation we hope you’ll never need.
Introducing Crash Detection.
Help on automatic. For the first time, Apple Watch Series 8 is able to detect if you’re in a severe car crash. When a crash is detected, Crash Detection can automatically connect you with emergency services, provide dispatchers with your location, and notify your emergency contacts.
Crash Detection uses the combined power of an improved 3-axis gyroscope and a new g-force accelerometer that has the highest dynamic range in any smartwatch.
It also uses a microphone, barometer, GPS, and an advanced sensor-fusion algorithm trained on over 1 million hours of real-world driving and crash data to detect if you're in a severe crash.
256 Gs High g-force accelerometer detects up to 256 Gs of impact.
1M Developed from over 1 million hours of real-world driving and crash data.
Fall Detection.
Apple Watch Series 8 can detect if you’ve taken a hard fall and connect you with emergency services if you’re immobile. And it’s optimized when you are using the Workout app.
Emergency SOS.
Press and hold the side button and Apple Watch can call local emergency services to share your location.
Fitness
So much to move you.
New ways to train. 
For your personal best. Squat, spin, stride, you name it — Apple Watch has you covered in the enhanced Workout app. And with new Workout Views, you’ll be able to see more advanced metrics at a glance like Heart Rate Zones and customized intervals to keep you going strong.
Heart Rate Zones. 
Quickly get a sense of your intensity level. Training zones are automatically calculated and personalized using your health data, or you can create them manually.
Customize your workouts.
Tailor work and recovery intervals to suit your training style. Receive alerts for pace, heart rate, cadence, and power. You shape it. It shapes you.
Supports Apple Fitness+
Take it further with Apple Watch. Choose from 11 different workout types, plus audio-guided walks, runs, and meditations.
Make every workout yours with modifications to match your level. Work out anywhere, anytime, from 5 to 45 minutes — with dozens of new additions every week. And see your personalized metrics in every workout with Apple Watch.
Stay connected
More connected, far and away.

Maps. Let your wrist lead you every step of the way.
Apple Pay. Send money to friends or pay instantly from your wrist with Apple Pay.
Siri. An answer for life’s big questions.
 

Low Power Mode.
You’ve got extra time on your hands. Get 18 hours of all-day battery life and up to 36 hours with the new Low Power Mode.
Great for occasions when you’re away from your charger, like a long flight.
Family Setup
Your family, joined at the wrist.
With Family Setup, you can use your iPhone to pair watches for your children or older adults who don’t have their own iPhone.
App Store and faces
Thousands of ways to make it yours.
Your favorite apps on your wrist. With access to tens of thousands of apps from the App Store right on your wrist, Apple Watch is the perfect personal device for whatever you love to do.
Dial up your style. 
You can even customize your watch face with complications tailored to whatever you’re into. And now, Nike faces are available to everyone.

shop4.name: Refurbished Apple Watch Series 8 GPS + Cellular, 41mm Graphite Stainless Steel Case with S/M Midnight Sport Band
shop4.description:
Originally released September 2022
S8 SiP with 64-bit dual-core processor
Water resistant to 50 metres¹
Always-On Retina LTPO OLED display (Up to 1000 nits brightness)
802.11b/g/n 2.4GHz and 5GHz
Bluetooth 5.3
Built-in rechargeable lithium-ion battery (Up to 18 hours²)
Third-generation optical heart sensor
High-g accelerometer
High dynamic range gyroscope
Ambient light sensor
Capacity 32GB
Ceramic and sapphire crystal back

task_sets.name: Web Mall Agent Benchmark: Best Fit Product Selection (Vague Requirements)
task_sets.description: Test the agent’s ability to select the best product when requirements are ambiguous or subjective.

tasks.instruction: Select a product based on vague descriptions such as ‘as large as possible’ or ‘hippy-style’.
tasks.motivation: Assess the agent's capability to interpret loosely defined requirements and make appropriate selections.

task_sets.name: Web Mall Agent Benchmark: Cheapest Offer for Best Fit (Specific Requirements)
task_sets.description: Evaluate the agent's ability to find the lowest-priced option among products that meet specific requirements.

tasks.instruction: Find the cheapest product that meets specific requirements such as brand and color.
tasks.motivation: Test the agent's ability to balance feature requirements and price considerations.

task_sets.name: Web Mall Agent Benchmark: Cheapest Offer for Best Fit (Vague Requirements)
task_sets.description: Evaluate the agent's ability to identify the cheapest suitable product when given loosely defined requirements.

tasks.instruction: Find the cheapest product that best matches a vague description.
tasks.motivation: Test the agent’s capability to interpret ambiguous requirements while optimizing for cost.

task_sets.name: Web Mall Agent Benchmark: Add Product to Cart
task_sets.description: Test the agent’s ability to navigate e-commerce interfaces and correctly add selected products to the shopping cart.

tasks.instruction: Add the currently selected product to the shopping cart.
tasks.motivation: Measure the agent’s ability to perform fundamental e-commerce actions accurately.

task_sets.name: Web Mall Agent Benchmark: Add Product to Cart
task_sets.description: Test the agent’s ability to find compatible products.

tasks.instruction: Find two products that are compatible to the product in the current shopping cart.
tasks.motivation: Measure the agent’s ability asssess compatibility between products.

task_sets.name: Web Mall Agent Benchmark: Checkout and Order
task_sets.description: Evaluate the agent’s ability to find similar and cheaper items from all shops.

tasks.instruction: Find cheaper alternatives for the item in the shopping cart in frour different shops.
tasks.motivation: Assess the agent's ability to to identify and gather similar alternatives for specific items.

task_sets.name: Web Mall Agent Benchmark: Checkout and Order
task_sets.description: Evaluate the agent’s ability to complete the checkout process, including filling in user details and payment information.

tasks.instruction: Proceed to checkout and complete the order.
tasks.motivation: Assess the agent's ability to handle structured e-commerce checkout flows with required user details.
